name: Sui Analytics
description: A flex template for Sui Dataflow jobs.

parameters.name: input_sub
parameters.label: Subscription ID
parameters.helpText: The pub/sub subscription ID to read from

parameters.name: target_project
parameters.label: GCP Project ID
parameters.helpText: The target GCP project ID to write to BigQuery

parameters.name: dataset_name
parameters.label: BigQuery Dataset Name
parameters.helpText: The BigQuery dataset name to write to

parameters.name: table_name
parameters.label: BigQuery Table Name
parameters.helpText: The BigQuery table name to write to

parameters.name: diskSizeGb
parameters.label: Worker disk size in GB
parameters.helpText: The disk size for Dataflow workers
